testcase.classname: To test About Feature functionality of Apollo Website
testcase.name: To validate calculate calories required functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Apollo homepage............................................passed When user clicks on Blogs option............................................passed And clicks on Health tools option...........................................passed And clicks on calculate calories button.....................................passed And enters age, gender, height, weight, activity level......................passed And clicks on calculate button..............................................passed Then it should give the result..............................................passed
